text: The 2003 British Open Championships was held at the Albert Hall, Nottingham from 28 September - 5 October 2003. David Palmer won the title defeating Peter Nicol in the final. There was a reduced field for the main draw with just four qualifying places available. ==Seeds== ==Draw and results== ===First Qualifying Round=== {| class="wikitable" |- !width=200| Player One
